name: Doraemon: Shin Nobita no Daimakyou - Peko to 5-nin no Tankentai
name_original: Doraemon: Shin Nobita no Daimakyou - Peko to 5-nin no Tankentai
description:
Doraemon: Shin Nobita no Daimakyou - Peko to 5-nin no Tankentai is an action game developed by FuRyu. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by FuRyu.
You can play Doraemon: Shin Nobita no Daimakyou - Peko to 5-nin no Tankentai on Nintendo 3DS.
